message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial to you.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true worth.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $10,750?
I understand your point, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,000. How about we meet at $10,200?
